From: Biblia. Durch Martin Luther, Nuernberg, 1736. "Der erste Buch Mose, Buch 4, Cap.32.German text on both sides of verso: "Kurze Erklaerung der Land..".Copperplate. Laor 815
Digital image of the original in the Moldovan Family Collection, New York
